availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew B. Johns (Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Ellen Barton Johns. Father of Mary F Johns, Hannah A Johns, Andrew J Johns, Presella Johns, Columbus Johns, Julia A Johns. Resident of Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #272806, p. 274.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 488.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct 1, p. 389A.
